import Fade from"@mui/material/Fade";// Soft UI Dashboard PRO React base styles
import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";// Soft UI Dashboard PRO React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var black=colors.black,light=colors.light;var size=typography.size,fontWeightRegular=typography.fontWeightRegular;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;export default{defaultProps:{arrow:true,TransitionComponent:Fade},styleOverrides:{tooltip:{maxWidth:pxToRem(200),backgroundColor:black.main,color:light.main,fontSize:size.sm,fontWeight:fontWeightRegular,textAlign:"center",borderRadius:borderRadius.md,opacity:0.7,padding:"".concat(pxToRem(5)," ").concat(pxToRem(8)," ").concat(pxToRem(4))},arrow:{color:black.main}}};
